ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Good course for somebody who has already completed substantial research on a topic and would like to spend time thinking about and engaging in the craft of writing.
Absolutely, yes. An excellent forum for working on larger-scale research projects.
I would certainly recommend this course to other students. It has been the most crucial course that I have taken because how much it pushed me to think about my ideas and future project.

I would recommend this course to another student. I would summarize it as an opportunity to actually flesh-out and work in-depth on a research project he or she had an interest in completing and as an opportunity to lear about the work and interests of other students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course was helpful for thinking through initial dissertation topics and very helpful for orienting different writing projects within disciplinary spaces, styles and publications.
Laid the foundation for future research/dissertation, and in this sense invaluable to overall disciplinary/professional development.
This course was crucial in framing my future dissertation project.
The course depended my knowledge on the process and importance of writing publishable research articles. It also deepened my knowledge of some of my specific research interests.
